message: Let's be fair and avoid inflation. I take $60, you take $40.
I think we can both get more if we're a bit more flexible. Let's try a 55/45 split, that way we both get a good chunk of the money before the inflation hits hard!
Bob, inflation is hurting me more each round. I need a bigger share than last time to make it worthwhile. Let's do $55 for me, $45 for you.
